item.description: Benefits of gond katira: Friends, there are some such herbs in Ayurveda which prove to be very beneficial and beneficial for human health. And can recover human health very quickly. Today we are going to talk about gond katira which is a yellow colored gum coming out of the tree. And it’s sticky and smelly […]
item.content:encoded:
Benefits of gond katira: Friends, there are some such herbs in Ayurveda which prove to be very beneficial and beneficial for human health. And can recover human health very quickly. Today we are going to talk about gond katira which is a yellow colored gum coming out of the tree. And it’s sticky and smelly and tasteless And its effect is very cold, so it should be consumed in summer only.

gond katira ke fayde: Gond katira is used to remove constipation, enlargement of breast, get rid of skin diseases and premature ejaculation or to remove physical weakness etc. Read below to know more……

Read also….Know the benefits of eating cashew, when and how to eat it

benefits of eating gond katira (gond katira ke fayde)

benefits of gond katira: remove weakness Gum katira helps to overcome physical weakness, a lot of protein and folic acid are found in gum katira. And by consuming gond katira, the body gets instant strength and by eating it, the blood becomes thick. If you keep 20 grams of gum katira soaked in a glass of water or milk and then mix it in the morning after making a sherbet and drink it, then it gets more benefit.

Weight loss: If we consume gum katira regularly, it also reduces the weight of our body. Gond katira helps in flushing out toxins from the body and increases the body’s metabolism. The high fiber found in it gives relief to your body for a longer time.

Read also……benefits of Ashwagandha remove physical weakness and sexual problems of men and women

For face: You can also improve your face by consuming gond katira, soak gond katira in a glass of water overnight. And after this, in the morning, mixing honey or jaggery in a glass of milk, you can make juice and consume it.

Increasing sexual power: Gond katira also increases sexual desire in men. Consumption of gond katira can increase the lost sexual desire in men. Apart from this, it also helps in preventing premature ejaculation discharge or night discharge. To consume it, you have to keep 10 grams of gum katira soaked in a glass of water every night. You can consume it the next morning by adding a teaspoon of sugar or adding sugar candy, you will start seeing its benefits in a few days.

Remove blisters in the mouth: People who have a lot of problem of blisters in the mouth, they can take gum katira. The blisters in the mouth can be removed by consuming gum katira. You can reduce the swelling, redness and pain caused by mouth ulcers in these ways. You make a finely ground paste of gum katira and apply it on your ulcers to get relief from ulcers. By doing this, you feel a lot of coolness on your ulcers and gond katira khane ke interactions also get a lot of relief, gradually it also starts getting better.

Read also…..Milk and honey panacea in many diseases Know its proper use and advantages and disadvantages

Disadvantages of eating gond katira

side effects of eating gond katira: By the way, there is no side effect of gum katira, it can be eaten and it can also be applied. If pregnant women and lactating women want to consume it, then I must consult a doctor. After this you are advised that if you consume any medicine or allopathic medicine, then after one to one and a half hours after that gum katira or herb should be consumed.

Friends, if you consume gum katira, then after consuming gum katira, it becomes very important for you to drink more and more water. Because gond katira is sticky which starts sticking in your intestine and blood. Which can cause you a lot of physical harm.

Read also…..Benefits of papaya and know its medicinal properties

item.description: Benefits of cumin: We use jeera in our home kitchen to make the food tasty. Cumin is present in almost every home kitchen. Cumin not only tastes good but it also has hidden health benefits. If you also want to know what happens by eating cumin. And how cumin keeps us healthy. So in this […]
item.content:encoded:
Benefits of cumin: We use jeera in our home kitchen to make the food tasty. Cumin is present in almost every home kitchen. Cumin not only tastes good but it also has hidden health benefits. If you also want to know what happens by eating cumin. And how cumin keeps us healthy. So in this post, I am going to tell you about all those things in detail below. Do read below to know more…..

There are two types of cumin seeds available in friends 1- Black cumin and 2- White cumin

White cumin: White cumin is most commonly used for making garam masala.

Black cumin: The same black cumin is mostly used in the kitchen to enhance the taste. Cumin is very beneficial for your health. Let us know about the medicinal properties of cumin.

Read also……benefits of eating dates: 10 advantages and disadvantages of eating dates with blood sugar, skin, and hair

In which disease cumin is useful (jeera ke fayde)

benefits of eating cumin: Friends, if we consume cumin, then it starts increasing our digestive powers. If we do not eat food properly. And due to the wrong way of eating, we start having problems with indigestion. In such a situation, if cumin is included in the food, then it increases your digestive power. And jeera also helps us to increase immunity power. Iron is found in abundance in cumin. This element helps in transporting oxygen to every cell of the body.

Benefits of drinking cumin water: Friends, if you consume cumin regularly. And after soaking cumin seeds, they consume their water. So it starts increasing the immunity power of your body. Just like if you feel weak. So, after soaking cumin seeds in water every night, filter that water thoroughly in the morning and consume it. So this can get rid of your physical fatigue and problems like gas.

to lose weight: Friends, if your body weight has increased a lot. So in such a situation, you must definitely consume cumin water. Your body weight can be removed by consuming jeera water. And if you consume it by mixing lemon juice with it. So it becomes very effective.

Read also…..Know the benefits of eating cashew, when and how to eat it

benefits of eating cumin on an empty stomach

benefits of cumin for stomach: Friends, if cumin is consumed in the morning on an empty stomach for three weeks. So you can get to see many benefits of it. If your weight is increasing, then after soaking cumin seeds at night and getting up in the morning, filter the water thoroughly and consume it.

So your weight starts decreasing rapidly. Along with this, regular consumption of cumin is very beneficial to remove the pain in bones and joints. It relieves pain by reducing inflammation. For joint pain, you should drink cumin water or apply cumin oil. Massaging with black cumin oil reduces knee pain. Apart from this, it is also very beneficial for diabetes. Diabetic patients should also consume cumin water.

Read also……benefits of Ashwagandha remove physical weakness and sexual problems of men and women

Its next advantage is that many women have to face problems like abdominal pain, cramps, and nausea during the monthly period for women. In such a situation, consuming cumin water gives relief from the problem of cramps and pain during menstruation. Jeera is also very beneficial for hair. Anti-fungal and anti-micro goods are found in abundance in cumin. Which are very beneficial to make you look young.

Read more…….

item.content:encoded:
Jio 5G free sim offer 2022: Friends, Jio 5G launch in India was launched very soon and the users waiting for the 5th generation internet are going to bat bat. Because Mukesh Ambani has made a big announcement about the launch of 5G service in the Annual General Meeting of Reliance Industries. Mukesh Ambani said that this year Diwali will start with jio 5G service. Initially, the company will launch Jio 5G service in Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata and Chennai.

By December 2023, Jio 5G internet service will be started in the whole country. Mukesh Ambani said that Jio 5G will give great calling and internet connectivity. That too jio 5G will be the world’s largest and most advanced 5G network at very low prices. Other operators of industries are applying nonsend alone 5G testing. The same jio is going to offer the latest Task Alone 5G to give the best 5G experience to the user.

Read also……Festival special offer of Samsung, Redmi, Infinix to know about 5G Launching in India this October

Jio 5G free sim offer 2022 Diwali offer

Jio 5G data offer: The country’s top telecom company Reliance Jio can provide this much speed fiber cable in its 5G service. Whose speed is expected to be 20 times higher than 4G service. In this episode, the company had completed large-scale tests for 5G-connected apps and services. According to Jio, customers will get fiber-like speed through N # mobile broadband. Speeds were measured up to 1GB mbps in tests.

Read also……WhatsApp has made 5 WhatsApp new update, know about its new feature

The company said that customers will get a minimum speed of more than 50 mbps on their mobile phones everywhere and at all times. Jio 5G is the world’s most hi-tech 5G network. Jio has a mix of the biggest and most accurate 5G spectrum. The company is going to offer excellent network coverage with 3500 mega # meatbank frequency 26 # millimeter WAPband and 700 mega # low bank spectrum. Jio is the only operator in the industry that has 700 mega # of spectrum, this spectrum is very important for deep in door coverage.

item.description: makhana benefits: Friends Makhana, which is also called fox net or kernel’s seed. It has been used in Chinese medicine since ancient times. item.content:encoded:
makhana benefits: Friends Makhana, which is also called fox net or kernel’s seed. It has been used in Chinese medicine since ancient times. It also holds an important place in the science of Ayurveda. Friends, today in this post we are going to tell about the benefits of Makhana only. What nutrients are found in it? How is it useful for our body? In today’s post, you will know about this, to know more about it, definitely read below…..

makhana khane ke faydeThis makhana is better for your health than almonds and walnuts. It is good for a person with high blood pressure due to high potassium and low sodium. It helps in maintaining and controlling the correct blood pressure level of the human body. Magnesium is abundant in Makhana. Magnesium improves the flow of blood, oxygen and other nutrients. It helps in fighting diseases like other heart problems. It is high in fiber and low in fat, so it also helps in weight loss.

Read also……benefits of eating dates: 10 advantages and disadvantages of eating dates with blood sugar, skin, and hair

benefits of fox net for men

makhana benefits for male: Friends, people consume this Makhana in different ways. Sometimes it is eaten by cooking it in kheer, while some eat it after cooking it in milk. So someone makes and eats its sweets, in this way people consume it. Due to which it is considered very good not only in terms of health but also in terms of taste. Which we know by many names. Also known as makhana, lotus seed, fox net and frilly lily.

You can get many benefits by including makhana in your diet. By the way, there are very few calories in Makhana. And magnesium, potassium, fiber, iron and zinc are found in abundance in it. If men consume Makhana. So it increases the sperm count of men and removes physical weakness. And helps in increasing sexual power.

Benefits of fox net for women: Friends, if women consume Makhana regularly. So it helps in increasing their sexual power by removing their physical weakness. and enhances fertility.

Read also…..Know the benefits of eating cashew, when and how to eat it

benefits of eating makhana on an empty stomach in the morning

makhana ke fayde: Friends, if you are suffering from diseases like diabetes and sugar. So you must definitely consume Makhana. If you consume 4 makhana on an empty stomach in the morning. So diseases like diabetes and sugar will go away soon. By consuming it, your body starts producing insulin. And the amount of sugar is reduced. Then gradually your sugar disease also starts ending. If you are a diabetic patient. And have done many medicines for him, still he is not being controlled. So once after taking the advice of the doctor, definitely try consuming Makhana.

Benefits of eating milk and makhana: Friends, Makhana not only relieves from diseases of sugar but also from major diseases like heart attack. By consuming this, our heart remains healthy and digestion process also takes place properly. People who have any problem related to heart. If their cholesterol level is increased or decreased. Those people must also consume Makhana. Fatal diseases like mental stress are also removed by the consumption of makhana. Due to which you start falling asleep very easily. Before sleeping at night, take makhana with milk.

Read also….benefits of Ashwagandha remove physical weakness and sexual problems of men and women

Disadvantages of eating Makhana

makhana side effects: how much makhana should eat Start consuming more than that. So its side effects can be seen. Due to which disease like allergy starts in your body. In such a situation, you should stop consuming makhana. Everyone knows that Makhana reached is beneficial for diabetic patients. It reduces the sugar level of the body. If you are taking diabetes medicine, then you should not consume it without the advice of the doctor.

If you consume Makhana with medicine, then it reduces the sugar level of your body so much. Due to which you may have to face many problems. Therefore, you should not consume it without the advice of the doctor.

Read also….benefits of eating figs Remove male strength and weakness

item.description: benefits of eating papaya: Benefits of papaya, papita ke fayde, when should we eat papaya? What medicinal properties are found in papaya? And what are the disadvantages of eating papaya? And can it harm your health? papita khane ke fayde, What should we not consume after eating papaya? All these things are explained below. If […]
item.content:encoded:
benefits of eating papaya: Benefits of papaya, papita ke fayde, when should we eat papaya? What medicinal properties are found in papaya? And what are the disadvantages of eating papaya? And can it harm your health? papita khane ke fayde, What should we not consume after eating papaya? All these things are explained below. If you want to know more about this papaya, then it is given below in detail, definitely read…..

Friends, the scientific name of papaya is Carica papaya. Papaya came to India about 300 years ago from today. Its family is Caricaceae. Papaya is delicious Apart from this, it is very beneficial for health. Papaya increases appetite and physical strength.

Friends, papaya is rich in vitamins. Nutritious elements like vitamin C, vitamin A, fiber and potassium are present. Due to which papaya leaves, seeds, roots and fruits are used in Ayurveda as a treatment for all diseases. It is very beneficial for our body.

Read also……benefits of eating dates: 10 advantages and disadvantages of eating dates with blood sugar, skin, and hair

Know the medicinal properties of papaya

Benefits of papaya: Many medicinal properties are found in papaya. It is very beneficial for our body. If we consume papaya regularly. So it keeps our body healthy.

Helpful in losing weight: Friends, if you are trying to reduce your body weight. So you should wake up every morning and consume papaya on an empty stomach. It is a rich in fiber and low in calories. This will keep your stomach full, due to which you will feel very less hungry. And because of this your weight will start decreasing gradually.

Keep arteries healthy: The presence of vitamin C, potassium, antioxidants and fiber in papaya helps in keeping the arteries of the body healthy. Which promotes blood flow, it lowers the cholesterol label of the body by increasing blood circulation. Which helps in controlling heart disease and your blood pressure.

Read also…..Know the benefits of eating cashew, when and how to eat it

Relief from body swelling: Papaya contains the enzyme pepsin. Which it is a natural pain killer. Apart from this, it helps in reducing inflammation in the body.

Beneficial for eyes and skin: Papaya contains many nutrients like Nutren Jacques Thein and Vitamin C. Which is very important for eye health. Its consumption also benefits the skin. Being vitamin C, it contains carotene like beta-carotene and lycopene. Which work to bring glow to the skin. This is the reason why its consumption can help reduce facial wrinkles and signs of ageing.

Papaya for cancer and liver: Many such medicinal properties are found in papaya. Which help keep your liver healthy and fight diseases like cancer.

Read also…..benefits of eating figs Remove male strength and weakness

right time to eat papaya

Benefits of eating papaya on an empty stomach: Friends, papaya contains very little amount of calories and high amount of fiber. Experts believe that the right time to eat papaya is in the morning. That is, if you wake up every morning and consume papaya on an empty stomach. So you can get many health benefits. Papaya is rich in vitamins, besides nutrients like phosphorus, magnesium and beta are found in it.

Apart from being low in calories, papaya is considered an excellent source of fiber. It not only reduces your weight, even it also controls cholesterol. Papaya removes toxins and is helpful in cleaning the digestive system. It keeps away problems like bloating, upset stomach and constipation.

Read also…..benefits of Ashwagandha remove physical weakness and sexual problems of men and women

side effects of eating papaya

Papita ki taseer: Friends, Benefits of papaya eating papaya is delicious and nutritious. But the Taseer taste of papaya is hot. Therefore, it should be avoided to consume it with cold things. According to Ayurveda, consumption of papaya should be avoided when the heat in the body increases. Along with this, consume papaya in limited quantity during the summer season.

pregnant women and lactating women who have babies under 1 year old. And people of asthma and bile nature if you have stones or if you have diarrhea together So in such a situation do not consume papaya at all. This will raise your body temperature and cause further damage to your deteriorating health.

Follow on Instagram

item.title: WhatsApp has made 5 WhatsApp new update, know about its new feature
item.dc:creator: Amitrpandey
item.description: Friends, there are some changes every day on WhatsApp. Similarly, 5 new changes have been seen in WhatsApp. If you guys have not yet known the change of this WhatsApp. So in today’s post I am going to tell about the new update of the same WhatsApp. And you must read this post till the […]
item.content:encoded:
Friends, there are some changes every day on WhatsApp. Similarly, 5 new changes have been seen in WhatsApp. If you guys have not yet known the change of this WhatsApp. So in today’s post I am going to tell about the new update of the same WhatsApp. And you must read this post till the last…..

Friends, whenever there is some new change or new update in WhatsApp. So some people like it. And some people feel bad. Some new updates are very useful for you. And some updates are so crap for you that they are of no use. But the small updates that come are of great use. If all of you are aware of the updates, then it can be very useful for you.

Read also…..Festival special offer of Samsung, Redmi, Infinix to know about 5G Launching in India this October

WhatsApp new 5 update

WhatsApp new update: 1- Friends, first of all talk about WhatsApp update. So the first update is for WhatsApp group admin. If you are the admin of any WhatsApp group. so good for you. New feature of WhatsApp If your WhatsApp group in shares the wrong video, photo or any such message. And you think these things are not right. and you want to delete it So you can delete it very easily. This video, image and message will not be deleted from your mobile, but from the devices of all the people in the group to whom it will reach.

Although this feature was first given to WhatsApp Beta users. That is, as many people use the beta version of WhatsApp. They must know about this feature. But now this feature has been rolled out globally. That is, you can see this feature inside any WhatsApp. If you knew about this feature. So tell me by writing in the comment box.

2- Friends, the second change in WhatsApp is about WhatsApp Fitter. Inside the filter you will get to see another button. It is by the name of unread that if you get a lot of messages on WhatsApp. And you see and read all those messages one by one. So some messages are left in that. So they go down quite a bit and watch us crawl it up and bring them up.

But now you will see by clicking in the search bar, a button of unread has come here. When you click on it, all the unread messages are there. The ones you haven’t seen or read yet. So all those messages will come together. It is good in a way, it will also save your time and you will be able to read the message quickly.

Read also……10 reasons for having a smartphone blast, otherwise you may have a huge loss

3- Friends this third update is very useful for you Sometimes what happens is that we want to send any message, video, photo and document. and accidentally moves on to someone else. Or by mistake any other message, video, photo and document is lost. and then we think delete it And when we delete it. So let’s do the trick on the message, video, photo or document and click on the delete button. write comes after that.

delete for me

cancel

delete for everyone

So we hastily clicked on delete for me. And that message, video, photo and document gets deleted from our mobile. But it is not deleted from the other person’s device on which the message, video, photo or document is sent. In this new feature, after deleting the bottom, you will get an icon of an undo. You can then get back the message, video, photo or document by clicking on it. Your deleted messages, videos, photos and documents will be back. Then you can delete for everyone by clicking on Delete.

4- Let’s talk about the fourth update of WhatsApp. So we should have got this update during the time of lockdown. But this update came a little late. But it’s okay If you want to talk to someone on a voice call or if you want to talk on a video call.

So you can generate a link of video call or voice call. If you want to have a meeting with multiple people. So you can share this link with all those people. And by clicking on that link, those people will be able to talk to you through your video conferencing or voice conferencing. Simultaneously 32 people can join this voice or video conferencing. This link will be valid for 90 days.

5- Friends, the fifth update of WhatsApp is that if you stay connected to any group of WhatsApp. And you do not like that group and you want to leave that group. So you can leave that group and after exit the group which is visible to all the people notification. That notification will be visible to the group admin only. With this, any person connected to you in the group cannot understand that you have left the group.

Follow on Instagram

item.title: Know the complete process of how to do wedding card printing business
item.dc:creator: Amitrpandey
item.category: How much does it take to start a card printing business?
How to start wedding card printing business?
What are the things needed for card printing?
item.description: shadi-ka-card-Kaise-Chhapte-Hain: Friends, if you want to do any business and you are thinking this. That I have to start a business at a very low cost. If you do not have enough budget you can do any big business. So in today’s post, I will tell you about the business of printing a small wedding […]
item.content:encoded:
shadi-ka-card-Kaise-Chhapte-Hain: Friends, if you want to do any business and you are thinking this. That I have to start a business at a very low cost. If you do not have enough budget you can do any big business. So in today’s post, I will tell you about the business of printing a small wedding card. By which you can earn millions by doing business. This business is useful in every season. and from time to time it is needed. So this business will do very well for you. If you know this business well then you can earn good money every month in every season.

Friends, in today’s post, I will talk about the business of printing wedding cards. How much does it cost? And what has to be done about it? The information of all these things will be told in detail below, to know more definitely read…….

How to start wedding card printing business?

Friends, talk about card printing or wedding card, then gradually the facility of this card is increasing. People demand all kinds of cards and get the cards printed. For example, whether it is a wedding card or a birthday party, engagement, banquet, or death banquet, people get all types of cards printed.

Similarly, you will continue to get offers to print many cards. People use cards to give invitations to people in any kind of program, festival, or any program. And these 12 months you will continue to get work. You can earn good money by doing this work.

Friends, you can do this business in two ways. If you want to do card printing digitally. So you will need a digital printing machine for this. The cost of which can be very high. If you want to print this card physically and for less money. So you have to make a physical printing machine. Which can be ready by making you a printing machine at a very low cost and after that you can print the card.

Read also……5 new business ideas to start with low cost

What are the things needed for card printing?

Friends, you want to open a card printing shop and do business. So you have to buy some stuff related to this business.

1- Card Printing Frame: Talking about the printing frame, you can buy this printing frame readymade from the market. Its angles can be found in the market. If you want to make this angle. So you can make it at home also. After making it, you have to set this angle in plywood.

2- Frame Glass: You have to take a mirror according to the card printing frame. With the help of this, you will be able to expose the matter on the frame.

3- Decoding Powder: When we are done printing our cards, we wash our matter frame. Which can be used as decorating powder while washing. Decoding powder cleans the matter in a good way. And the frame looks the same as before.

4- Nitro: We also call nitro thinner, We also call nitro thinner, with the help of this we use it to get rid of the coating on the frame. It cleans thinner frames well.

5- Supercoat: With the help of this super coat, we prepare the coating.

6- Emulsion: With the help of this emulsion, we prepare the coating.

7- Butter Paper: We use butter paper to print the matter from the computer. The matter is printed on butter paper only by a laser printer. Whose painting looks very good.

8- Color Paint: You can choose the paint color according to the color of your card. You can use any type of color on your card. Which you will get available in the market.

9- Sanitizer: We use sanitizer to prepare the coating.

10- Tape: We use tape to cover the frame. So that the paint does not get on the card outside the frame.

After buying all these items, you have to prepare the matter on your computer. After preparing the material, you can print it on butter paper with a laser printer. After printing, you can expose it on the frame. After the exposure, you can print the card.

How much does it take to start a card printing business?

To do a card printing business, you have to first spend ₹ 3000 to ₹ 4000. After that, you can do this business. Its printing can be done very easily. If you want to start a business at a low cost. So definitely do this business.

Read more…….

Follon on Instagram

item.title: Milk and honey panacea in many diseases Know its proper use and advantages and disadvantages
item.dc:creator: Amitrpandey
item.category: Benefits of eating one spoon of honey daily
In which diseases is honey useful?
item.description: Benefits of honey: Talking about the benefits of eating honey, it is considered useful in the treatment of many diseases. This is the reason that people use it as a medicine since ancient times. In today’s time, people mainly use honey to improve skin, keep digestion fine, increase immunity power and reduce weight etc. Apart […]
item.content:encoded:
Benefits of honey: Talking about the benefits of eating honey, it is considered useful in the treatment of many diseases. This is the reason that people use it as a medicine since ancient times. In today’s time, people mainly use honey to improve skin, keep digestion fine, increase immunity power and reduce weight etc.

Apart from this, anti-bacterial and antiseptic properties are found in the city. Due to which it is very useful in healing the wound or in getting quick relief from the injury. Many nutritious elements are found in the city. In which the city is a storehouse of essential nutrients, minerals and vitamins.

Read also….benefits of eating dates: 10 advantages and disadvantages of eating dates with blood sugar, skin, and hair

In which diseases is honey useful?

increase immunity: Honey is high in essential antioxidants. The antioxidants present in it are very beneficial for the heart. And protect against many types of diseases related to heart. Apart from this, the main function of honey is to increase the immunity of the body. By strengthening the immunity power of your body, it protects against many types of infectious diseases.

skin burns and cuts: Honey is considered very beneficial for skin burns and cuts. The antiseptic properties of honey help to heal the burn quickly. And also protect the skin from infection. If you have a minor scratch on your skin or a minor burn So apply honey on that part, it reduces the irritation and prevents infection in that part.

Read also…….Know the benefits of eating cashew, when and how to eat it

Relief from cough: Friends, if your cough is coming for a long time and it is not getting better. So you use honey, it is an effective home medicine to get relief from cough. The antibacterial properties present in honey prevents the infection from growing further. Also, it dilutes the cup which can be easily removed. Especially those who are troubled by dry cough, they get quick relief from honey.

constipation relief: Honey is beneficial in relieving constipation. It reduces the absorption of fructose in the body. Because of this, you can also use it to relieve constipation. Apart from providing relief from constipation, it also provides relief from flatulence and gas problems. To get relief from constipation, take a glass of lukewarm milk mixed with a spoonful of honey every night before sleeping. This will remove your constipation problem and your body will get strength.

lose weight: For your information, let us tell you that fat is not found in the city at all. Along with controlling weight, it also reduces the cholesterol level of the body. That’s why take honey regularly. Drink a glass of lukewarm water mixed with a spoonful of honey every morning on an empty stomach. Do not eat anything for half to 1 hour after drinking it. You can also add the juice of half a lemon to this mixture.

Read also……benefits of eating figs Remove male strength and weakness

Benefits of eating one spoon of honey daily

benefits of eating honey: benefits of eating honey: Friends, fructose is mainly found in honey. Apart from this, carbohydrates, riboflavin, niacin, vitamin B6, vitamin C and amino acids are found in it. One teaspoon i.e. 21 grams of honey contains about 64 calories and about 17 grams of sugar i.e. fructose, glucose, sucrose and maltose. Fat fiber and protein is not found at all in the city.

Read also…..benefits of Ashwagandha remove physical weakness and sexual problems of men and women

harm of eating honey

Honey is an Ayurvedic medicine but if we do not consume it regularly and properly. So it can also harm our body. Friends, if we use honey more, then its effect can be seen on our small intestine. Because the nutrients present inside the city are absorbed by the small intestine. Which affects the small intestine. Honey makes blood, which can make you feel weak and sweaty

Honey is an Ayurvedic medicine but if we do not consume it regularly and properly. So it can also harm our body. Friends, if we use honey more, then its effect can be seen on our small intestine. Because the nutrients present inside the city are absorbed by the small intestine. Which affects the small intestine. Honey makes blood, which can make you feel weak and sweaty. Apart from this, if you consume honey daily, then you may also have nausea and vomiting.

If you consume more honey then it starts increasing the calorie intake of your body. Excessive consumption of honey can cause bloating in the stomach. If you have diabetes problem then you should not consume honey. If you consume honey, it can cause damage to your body and problems like allergies.
